ComicInfo.Summary:
When a young comic shop employee is transformed by mystical blades into a walking talking (slicing & dicing) 90s comic book bad girl, she must quickly learn how to survive the new grotesque world the blades reveal. Now, other-dimensional parasites hidden all around us resembling the “space vampires” from the 90s comic, Vampblade, are all too real, and out for her blood!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Winston Young | 1 | B | Cover B, Limited to 1500 | Winston Young | 2 | C | Risque Cover C, Limited to 2500 | Winston Young | 3 | Note: The digital edition (5/18/2016) for this volume was released before the print edition.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-11-25 13:14:40. [Issue ID 530828]
